alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Essex, northwestern Suffolk and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winchester, or over Medford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, Lynn, Somerville, Waltham, Malden, Medford, Revere, Peabody, Arlington, Everett, Salem, Billerica, Beverly, Woburn, Chelsea, Andover, Watertown, Lexington, and Tewksbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex
